## AuthenticateWithTOTPOptions interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [otp](./react-native.authenticatewithtotpoptions.otp.md) | <code>string</code> | TOTP code. |
|  [skipMFAForCurrentDevice](./react-native.authenticatewithtotpoptions.skipmfaforcurrentdevice.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Mark the current device as trusted device. MFA would be skipped for this device for a period. |
